snippet: Moscow awoke to the horrifying news on Friday that a masked man had thrown acid on Sergei Filin, the artistic director of one of the city’s jewels, the Bolshoi Ballet.
abstract: Masked man throws acid in the face of Sergei Filin, artistic director of Moscow's Bolshoi Ballet, causing third-degree burns and severely damaging his eyes; motive for crime remains unsolved, but stories concerning vengeance over professional jealousy at the theater go back centuries.

byline.contributor: Sophia Kishkovsky contributed reporting from New York and Andrew Roth from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Moscow awoke to the horrifying news on Friday that a masked man had thrown acid on Sergei Filin, the artistic director of one of the city’s jewels, the Bolshoi Ballet.

headline.seo: Acid Attack on Sergei Filin of Bolshoi Shocks Moscow
headline.main: Harsh Light Falls on Bolshoi After Acid Attack
headline.print_headline: Harsh Light Falls on Bolshoi After Acid Attack
